title: Zasuofizzaxhaodyrtryndareliarina, The Balanced Champion
body:
http://s15.postimg.org/982nk4yff/RENTALPERFECT.jpg

- Image of Zasuofizzaxhaodyrtryndareliarina

Hey guys I had a really cooooooollllll idea for a champion

His Q has a slow travel time so it's easy to dodge.

I feel his W scales reaaalyyy good into the late game due to the high ratios, and it shoulkdn't be opresive during the early game due to the low damage!

His E keeps him relevant even when his long cooldown abilities are off!

His ult keeps things fresh and make him a constant threat, forcing the opponent to be extremely careful when at low hitpoints in his presence else they trigger a chain!!!!. i feel thid id balanced cue to the extremely high cd on it

Recommended build:
AP build: {{item:1056}} {{item:1056}} {{item:1056}} {{item:1056}} {{item:1056}} {{item:1056}} 
Lets you reach full build extremely quickly!

AD build: {{item:1055}} {{item:1055}} {{item:1055}} {{item:1055}} {{item:1055}} {{item:1055}}
AD build makes his ult a real threat

Passive - Hate Speech
Every time a word that would normally be censored is used in chat, Zasuofizzaxhaodyrtryndarelia gains 100 AP, 10% lifesteal/spellvamp, 20% crit chance, and 100 AD.

Q - Steel Urchin [CD: 3]
Deals basic attack damage + (100% AP) + (100% AD). This is a targeted ability, with 2000 unit range that also takes Zasuofizzaxhaodyrtryndarelia to the target at very high velocity at 1000 units per second going off Einsteins theory of relativity which states nothing can go faster than the very hihg speeds of Zasuofizzaxhaodyrtryndarelia at maximux velocity.

W - Tidal wall [CD: 5]
Passive: Is surrounded by a permanent windwall. It can be deactivated by dealing 50% of max HP in 2 seconds. 
Active: Becomes untargetable for 5 seconds, during this time he gains 200% movement speed. May reactivate to deal 10/20/30/40/50 + (200% AP) (200% AD).

E - Seastone style [CD: 10]
Passive: Hitting an enemy deals 5/6/7/8/9% max HP for every 100 AP that Zasuofizzaxhaodyrtryndarelia has. Also has NO atttack speed cap.
Active: Moves at maximum velocity and gains 2.5/2.6/2.7/2.8/2.9x attack speed for 10 seconds.

R - Five toe death kick [CD: 500]
Deals 10% of max HP for every 10 AD Zasuofizzaxhaodyrtryndarelia has. Cooldown is reset on kill.
